name: 斯蒂芬·扬库
introduction: Stefan Iancu grew up in Bucharest and started acting at the age of 4. By the time he was 15 years old he had already played in Romanian productions but also in various international films with actors like Pu-239 with Oscar Isaac, Born to Raise Hell with Steven Seagal and Walking with the Enemy with Ben Kingsley. Over the last years Stefan starred in Avant que je m'en aille by Julien Barazer, Bucharest Seen From Above by Andrei Raudu and the feature film One Step Behind the Seraphim by Daniel Sandu, which won many international awards and got Stefan a Romanian Academy Award. He is currently still studying acting at the Caragiale Academy of Theatrical Arts and Cinematography. Since 2018 he plays one of the main characters in the very successful series VLAD, which is shooting season 3 this year. Stefan was selected and won the Best Newcomer award at the Subtitle Film Festival 2019.
